1.0.name: wordpress/dynamic-faqs
1.0.description: A simple yet dynamic faq page that can be added in your navigation menu without adding any code to your existing theme. It uses JQUERY and AJAX to make the contents more dynamic without affecting the current page. It inherits your themes lay-out (CSS) and automatically modifies the page layout to give way for your published questions with corresponding answers. If no javascript is enabled, the contents will display like a blog archive.
